entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
